subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Real Madrid was disqualified from the Copa del Rey after fielding Denis Cheryshev, who was ineligible, in its opening round. Madrid said it would appeal the decision by the Spanish soccer federation.
snippet: Real Madrid was disqualified from the Copa del Rey after fielding Denis Cheryshev, who was ineligible, in its opening round. Madrid said it would appeal the decision by the Spanish soccer federation.
